name: Sunday Lawd REEL 1
description:
Alright my first playdate game. Its part 1 (reel 1) and free. I may charge for reel 2 or what not. Anyhoo, its based on my older game ideas the shaking...

The Shaking... Demo Reel by Game portal.... (itch.io) (for spectrum ZX)

and Sunday Blues made in Bitsy which has some similarities to Playdate  

Sunday Blues (demo reel) by Game portal.... (itch.io)

Cranking SLOW at times is the key to playing this game...as it plays out as an old film, you can change the reels by slowing down cranks until a different outcome happens! It took lots of work to make, and I learned about the playdate  image process....

FIXED crashing bug in reel1a.. also see it in action a bit....

Sunday Lawd playdate console game reel 1 - YouTube

You go back in an alternative universe and find the 1888 national Sunday bill (blue laws) did in fact pass, and now  your freedom is restricted. What to do? Will you continue to

play the accordion for money? Will you get a pet monkey? Is love in the air??
